name: Spaced out (Windmill Games)
description:
Space racing meets Musical Chairs in the fast paced arcade game "Spaced out".

USE A CONTROLLER FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

OPTIONS (While in menu)

Press T to toggle between 1080p and 720p resolution.

Press F to toggle Fullscreen

Controlls:

CONTROLLER
LStick - Steer
Rtrigger - Throttle
Ltrigger - Break
X - Use PowerUp
A - Drift

KEYBOARD
WASD or Arrow keys - steering / throttle
E - Use PowerUp
SPACE - Drift
